attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dissolve parliament completely and create a UK online democracy where every person has an equal opportunity to manage the country

The recent local online elections and the current online petitions have proved that the technology is there and available to more people than existing word of mouth principles which may become distorted according to the narrator

Let the people of the UK and then the world take responsibility for their own actions

We will make mistakes but let those be our collective mistakes and not those of a small majority of people who may not have the best interests of the population at heart

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
